author: jeremias
msg: Some TrueType fonts have multiple font family names which we haven't extracted so far. All these names are now exposed as a Set of Strings.
An example: Futura Book BT has two font families: Futura (Mac platform) and Futura Bk BT (Windows platform).

author: rickmcguire
msg: GERONIMO-3591 javamail URLName() class does not HTTP encode URL username elements

author: dkulp
msg: Start of xmlbeans databinding (doesn't handle much yet)
Fix some issues with not generating imports into schemas

author: wrowe
msg: Inject APROUTDIR into the process so that the DebugNT|ReleaseNT
models pick up the appropriate apr-specific directories, and
begin to try building a non apr .. apr-util .. apr-iconv tree
structure with additional path hints to apr and apr-util.
